body:
`rocprofiler` depends at runtime on libraries installed through rocprofiler https://github.com/ROCm-Developer-Tools/rocprofiler/blob/93778bdc4fa5403fedede3afcc1155338c62a6f3/bin/rpl_run.sh#L29

Despite the assumption that the directory layout is fixed https://github.com/ROCm-Developer-Tools/rocprofiler/issues/58

Spack should probably add a runtime dependency as well.
https://github.com/spack/spack/blob/b92fd080289875382ca31e4eb7a1341508257348/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/rocprofiler-dev/package.py#L36

(Just run into one system today were everything was broken...)

cc: @haampie @cgmb
title: Installation issue: rocprofiler-dev has a runtime dependency on roctracer-dev
